cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/03/6301376_f179b70ece.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/6301376/ "photo sharing") [By Borough Market](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/6301376/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
As promised, a few pics from Borough Market. One of the charms of the place is the feeling that a small portion of Victorian London survives surprisingly unchanged. This pic catches some of that.
